item.text: Two days before the Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread, the chief priests and the experts in the law were trying to find a way to arrest Jesus by stealth and kill him.
For they said, “Not during the feast, so there won’t be a riot among the people.”

Now while Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon the leper, reclining at the table, a woman came with an alabaster jar of costly aromatic oil from pure nard. After breaking open the jar, she poured it on his head.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> present <st data-num="23" class="">indignantly</st> said <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438">one another</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="684" class="">waste</st> of expensive<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3464" class="">ointment</st>?

<st data-num="3778">It</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> have been <st data-num="4097" class="">sold</st> for <st data-num="1883">more than</st> <st data-num="5145">300</st> <st data-num="1220">silver coins</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the money<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="4" /> they <st data-num="1690">spoke angrily</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2036" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="863">Leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> alone. <st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> are you <st data-num="2873">bothering</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>? She has <st data-num="2038" class="">done</st> a <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">service</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you will <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2095" class="">good</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> you will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!<n id="1" />

She <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> she <st data-num="2192" class="">could</st>. She <st data-num="3462" class="">anointed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="4301" class="">beforehand</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1780" class="">burial</st>.
I tell you the truth, wherever the gospel is proclaimed in the whole world, what she has done will also be told in memory of her.”
Then Judas Iscariot, one of the Twelve, went to the chief priests to betray Jesus into their hands.
When they heard this, they were delighted and promised to give him money. So Judas began looking for an opportunity to betray him.
Now on the first day of the Feast of Unleavened Bread, when the Passover lamb is sacrificed, Jesus’ disciples said to him, “Where do you want us to prepare for you to eat the Passover?”

He <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5217">Go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="941" class="">carrying</st> a <st data-num="2765" class="">jar</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> will <st data-num="528" class="">meet</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="190" class="">Follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="3699" class="">Wherever</st> he <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> the <st data-num="3617">owner of the house</st>, ‘The <st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st>, “<st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2646">guest room</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> I may <st data-num="2068">eat</st> the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples?”’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="1166" class="">show</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">large</st> <st data-num="508" class="">room upstairs</st>, <st data-num="4766" class="">furnished</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st>. <st data-num="2090" class="">Make preparations</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>.”
So the disciples left, went into the city, and found things just as he had told them, and they prepared the Passover.
Then, when it was evening, he came to the house with the Twelve.

While <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="345">were at the table</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="3860" class="">betray</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”<n id="3" />

They were <st data-num="757">distressed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3385">Surely not</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>?”

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “It is <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="1427" class="">Twelve</st>, one who <st data-num="1686" class="">dips</st> his hand<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5165" class="">bowl</st>.<n id="2" />
For the Son of Man will go as it is written about him, but woe to that man by whom the Son of Man is betrayed! It would be better for him if he had never been born.”
While they were eating, he took bread, and after giving thanks he broke it, gave it to them, and said, “Take it. This is my body.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> after <st data-num="2983" class="">taking</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2168">giving thanks</st>, he <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> it to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drank</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>, the blood<n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st>,<n id="2" /> that is <st data-num="1632">poured out</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="1081" class="">fruit</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="288" class="">vine</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> I <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>.”<n id="3" />
After singing a hymn, they went out to the Mount of Olives.

Then Jesus said to them, “You will all fall away, for it is written,

“‘I will strike the shepherd,

and the sheep will be scattered.’
But after I am raised, I will go ahead of you into Galilee.”

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2532">Even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4624">fall away</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>!”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st>—<st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>—<st data-num="4250" class="">before</st> a <st data-num="220" class="">rooster</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">crows</st> <st data-num="1364" class="">twice</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="533" class="">deny</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5151">three times</st>.”
But Peter insisted emphatically, “Even if I must die with you, I will never deny you.” And all of them said the same thing.
Then they went to a place called Gethsemane, and Jesus said to his disciples, “Sit here while I pray.”

He <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="757">became</st> <st data-num="1568">very troubled</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="85" class="">distressed</st>.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1473">My</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">soul</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4036">deeply grieved</st>, <st data-num="2193">even to the point</st> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>. <st data-num="3306" class="">Remain</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1127">stay alert</st>.”

<st data-num="4281" class="">Going</st> a <st data-num="3397" class="">little</st> farther, he <st data-num="4098" class="">threw</st> himself <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st> the <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> would <st data-num="3928" class="">pass</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
He said, “Abba, Father, all things are possible for you. Take this cup away from me. Yet not what I will, but what you will.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">sleeping</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, “<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, are <st data-num="3756" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">sleeping</st>? <st data-num="3756 2480">Couldn’t</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1127">stay awake</st> for <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>?

<st data-num="1127">Stay awake</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> you will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3986" class="">temptation</st>. The <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> is <st data-num="4289" class="">willing</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> is <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st>.”
He <st data-num="565">went away</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> and <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="3056">thing</st>.

When he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> he <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">sleeping;</st> they could <st data-num="916" class="">not keep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="916" class="">open</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="1492" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> to <st data-num="611" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

He <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> a <st data-num="5154">third time</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Are you <st data-num="3062" class="">still</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">sleeping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="373" class="">resting</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="568">Enough of that</st>!<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>. <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> is <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> of <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>.
Get up, let us go. Look! My betrayer is approaching!”
Right away, while Jesus was still speaking, Judas, one of the Twelve, arrived. With him came a crowd armed with swords and clubs, sent by the chief priests and experts in the law and elders.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> the <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayer</st><n id="1" /> had <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> a <st data-num="4953" class="">sign</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “The <st data-num="3739" class="">one</st> I <st data-num="5368" class="">kiss</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man</st>. <st data-num="2902" class="">Arrest</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="520" class="">lead</st> him <st data-num="520">away</st> <st data-num="806" class="">under guard</st>.”)<n id="2" />

When Judas<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">arrived</st>, he <st data-num="4334">went up</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2705" class="">kissed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

Then they <st data-num="1911">took</st> <st data-num="5495">hold</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2902" class="">arrested</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1520" class="">One</st> of the <st data-num="3936" class="">bystanders</st> <st data-num="4685" class="">drew</st> his <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st> and <st data-num="3817" class="">struck</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest’s</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="851">cutting off</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5621" class="">ear</st>.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Have you <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3162" class="">swords</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3586" class="">clubs</st> to <st data-num="4815" class="">arrest</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> you would an <st data-num="3027" class="">outlaw</st>?<n id="1" />

Day <st data-num="2596">after</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">day</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st><n id="1" /> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2902" class="">arrest</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> this has happened <st data-num="2443">so that</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st> would be <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the disciples<n id="2" /> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="5343" class="">fled</st>.

A <st data-num="3495" class="">young man</st> was <st data-num="4870" class="">following</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="4016" class="">wearing</st> only a <st data-num="4616">linen cloth</st>. They tried to <st data-num="2902" class="">arrest</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,
but he ran off naked, leaving his linen cloth behind.
Then they led Jesus to the high priest, and all the chief priests and elders and experts in the law came together.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> had <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="3113" class="">distance</st>, <st data-num="2193">up to</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest’s</st> <st data-num="833" class="">courtyard</st>. He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4775" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="5257" class="">guards</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2328" class="">warming</st> himself <st data-num="4314" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">fire</st>.

The <st data-num="749" class="">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4892" class="">Sanhedrin</st> were <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">evidence</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1519">so that</st> they could <st data-num="2289" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2289">to death</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> anything.

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> <st data-num="5576">gave false testimony</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2470" class="">agree</st>.

<st data-num="5100" class="">Some</st> <st data-num="450">stood up</st> and <st data-num="5576">gave</st> this <st data-num="5576" class="">false testimony</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st><n id="1" />

“<st data-num="1473">We</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1473">I</st> will <st data-num="2647" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="5499">made with hands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="886">not made with hands</st>.’”

<st data-num="2532">Yet</st> <st data-num="3761">even</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">on this point</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> did <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2470" class="">agree</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="450">stood up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">before</st> them<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, “Have <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> that they are <st data-num="2649">testifying against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he was <st data-num="4623" class="">silent</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="611" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st>. <st data-num="3825" class="">Again</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1905" class="">questioned</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1510">Are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of the <st data-num="2128">Blessed One</st>?”
“I am,” said Jesus, “and you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of the Power and coming with the clouds of heaven.”

<st data-num="1161">Then</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1284" class="">tore</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5509" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> do <st data-num="2192" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st>?

You have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="988" class="">blasphemy</st>! <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">verdict</st>?”<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2632" class="">condemned</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1510">as</st> <st data-num="1777" class="">deserving</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.
Then some began to spit on him, and to blindfold him, and to strike him with their fists, saying, “Prophesy!” The guards also took him and beat him.
Now while Peter was below in the courtyard, one of the high priest’s slave girls came by.

When she <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2328" class="">warming</st> himself, she <st data-num="1689" class="">looked directly</st> at <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="2532">also</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> that <st data-num="3479" class="">Nazarene</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="720" class="">denied</st> it:<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="3777" class="">don’t even</st> <st data-num="1987">understand</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4771">you’re</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">talking</st> about!”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="3" /> he <st data-num="1831" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4259" class="">gateway</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> a <st data-num="220">rooster</st> <st data-num="5455">crowed</st>.<n id="4" />

When the <st data-num="3814">slave girl</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, she <st data-num="757">began</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to the <st data-num="3936" class="">bystanders</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537">one of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="720" class="">denied</st> it <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>. A <st data-num="3398">short time</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">later</st> the <st data-num="3936" class="">bystanders</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, “You <st data-num="230">must</st> be<n id="1" /> one <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> a <st data-num="1057" class="">Galilean</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="332" class="">curse</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="3660">swore with an oath</st>, “I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> you are <st data-num="3004" class="">talking</st> about!”
Immediately a rooster crowed a second time. Then Peter remembered what Jesus had said to him: “Before a rooster crows twice, you will deny me three times.” And he broke down and wept.
